name: Rageosaur Superstar Soccer
description:
This is a multiplayer build. You will need two controllers to play.

 Dinosaurs can't really use keyboard and mouse... their arms are too small fo that :(

Rageosaur Superstar soccer is a competitive game of robotic dinosaurs playing soccer. Basically, it's an arena game where the objective is to win the soccer match. For that, you'll shoot the ball and try to score. At the same time, you can shoot the other player to destroy their Dinobot.
